ul.li: Dionysiou logginou peri ypsous biblion [microform] : ellēnisti suggraphthen : eis Rōnmaichēn, Italichēn [kai] Gallichēn thōnēn [mitaphrazen?] sun scholiois = Dionysii Longini De sublimi libellus : Graece conscriptus, Latino, Italico, & Gallico sermone redditus : additis adnotationibus.

Dionysiou Logginou Peri ypsous biblion : ellēnisti suggraphthen : eis Rōnmaichēn, Italichēn [kai] Gallichēn thōnēn [mitaphrazen?] sun scholiois = Dionysii Longini De sublimi libellus : Graece conscriptus, Latino, Italico, & Gallico sermone redditus : additis adnotationibus.
